Test files for the replace subcommand.

-- test: no match --
-c=A -regex=baz -repl=bar

-- in: --
A
Foo
food
afoot

-- want: --
A
Foo
food
afoot

-- test: simple regexp --
-c=A -regex=^foo -repl=bar

-- in: --
A
Foo
food
afoot

-- want: --
A
Foo
bard
afoot

-- test: regexp case-insensitive --
-c=A -regex=^foo -i -repl=bar

-- in: --
A
Foo
food
afoot

-- want: --
A
bar
bard
afoot

-- test: regexp capture group --
-c=A -regex=f(oo) -i -repl=b$1

-- in: --
A
Foo
food
afoot

-- want: --
A
boo
bood
aboot

-- test: template, one group --
{"Col": "A", "Regexp": "\\d+$", "Templ": "{{ printf \"%05d\" (atoi $0) }}"}

-- in: --
A
x123
y4
z99

-- want: --
A
x00123
y00004
z00099

-- test: template, two groups --
{"Col": "A", "Regexp": "\\d+", "Templ": "{{ printf \"%05d\" (atoi $0) }}"}

-- in: --
A
a98 x123
b3 y4
c2182 z99

-- want: --
A
a00098 x00098
b00003 y00003
c02182 z02182
